lg.l: sa kṛtapānthavadhūjanavepathū rasamayaḥ samayaḥ sma vijṛmbhate || 43||

div.p: A° giriśo haraḥ | ‘girau ḍaś chandasi’ iti pratyayadvāreṇa cchandasi niyamitatvād giriśaśabdasya bhāṣāyāṃ prayogaḥ pramādajaḥ | rasaḥ salilaṃ rāgaś ca | tanmayaḥ samayo varṣārātraḥ || 43 ||

lg.l: aśamayac cirasaṃbhṛtam ambhasā manasi mānakalaṅkam api striyāḥ |

div.p: A° payodharāṇāṃ dhoraṇī paṅktiḥ | kimu bhuvi rajo nāśamayad iti nañ atra sāmarthyalabhyaḥ || 44 ||
A° saṃvananaṃ vaśīkaraṇam | atanuḥ kāmaḥ | avāsiṣur vavuḥ || 45 ||
A° saninādāḥ payomuco yatra tasmin kāle mayūreṇa nṛttavyasanavatā sthitam | navaiś candrakaiḥ picchair lāñchitā lakṣitā, candrasya ca kalayā āñchitā saṃgatā || 46 ||

A° āntaramārgo gahanaḥ pradeśaḥ | tadgatāṃ śriyaṃ vanabhuvo 'vahan | jātir mālatī tayā śarīraruk svarūpaśobhā prakaṭā yāsām | tathā jātayaḥ śuddhavikṛtabhedenāṣṭādaśa ṣāḍjīṣaḍjamadhyamadhyamāprabhṛtayaḥ | tatsvarūpasyeva ca rug yāsām | tāsām eva ca viśeṣo 'ntaramārgo bhavati | dviśrutyadhikayor niṣādagāndhārayor yathākramaṃ kākalyantarasvarasaṃjñatvakalpanāt | kavalanā grāsaḥ | tadarthaṃ valanā paribhramaṇam || 47 ||
A° mekalo vindhyaḥ | tena meghasya sāmyam asitavarṇatvāt | acirārciḥ saudāmanī | ānatayā punaḥpunar ullasanena dausthityam asmāsu na janayitavyam ity āśayena prahvayā || 48 ||
A° alakānāṃ tāṇḍavikair nartakaiḥ || 49 ||

lg.l: ka iva te 'nukṛtorjitabhūbhṛtā ghanacayena ca ye na vaśīkṛtāḥ || 50 ||

div.p: A° śakradhanur manohareṇa, gavalasya ca mahiṣaśṛṅgasya śyāmatayā śobhāṃ gṛhṇatā ca, ghanānāṃ cayena bhūbhṛteva caturaṃ kṛtvā na ye vaśīkṛtās te ka iva janāḥ | na kecit | rājā punar anargharatnayogena sphuritendradhanuryo hāras tadvān caturaṅgasya balasya hastyaśvarathapattilakṣaṇasya sainyasya śobhāṃ kalayati || 50 ||

lg.l: saharigopakam aikṣata bhūtalaṃ vrajam ivāñcitalāṅgalikaṃ janaḥ |

div.p: A° harigopā indragopākhyāḥ prāṇinaḥ harigopaś ca goparūpadhārī viṣṇuḥ | vrajo gavāṃ nivāsaḥ | añcitā śreṣṭhā lāṅgalikā auṣadhiviśeṣo yatra | añcitaś ca pūjito lāṅgalī haladharo yatra | anavo reṇuś cirasaṃcitaṃ rajaḥ || 51 ||

A° atanoḥ kāmasya bahulāyāś ca śriya ālayatvaṃ kalayatā gṛhṇatā kuṭajākhyakusumanicayena nakṣatragaṇavad ācaritam | nabhasi śrāvaṇe 'ntarikṣe ca | candrākārair dalaiḥ pallavaiḥ, candrasya ca dalena khaṇḍenojjvale rucire || 52 ||

lg.l: vikira vāri vilolaya vidyuto nabhasi garja tiraskuru diktaṭān |

div.p: A° vāri vikira jalaṃ vikiran ityādikam ācaran jalado viyutāṃ viyoginīṃ na navaśām, api tv āyattām eva cakāra | vikiretyādau ‘samuccaye 'nyatarasyām’ iti loṭ | hirādeśaś ca | ācaran iti sāmānyavacanasyānuprayogaḥ ‘samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya’ iti || 53 ||

lg.l: avasare malino 'py upakārakaḥ kvacid itīva ravais taruṇān bhraman |

div.p: A° nigūhanena sthitimataḥ sukhitān ittham iva ravais taruṇānambudo 'bhyadhyāt | abhimato 'tīvābhipretaḥ | samāgamakāraṇatvāt ||54 ||

lg.l: vyadhita hāri kadambam api striyaḥ smaravaśā ravaśāliśilīmukham ||15||
ghanatamasyabalāḥ samavartinā dadṛśire virahaglapitā na yāḥ |

div.p: A° alātam ulmukam | tatsadṛśī taḍid āvirabhavat prakaṭībabhūva | samavartī yamaḥ ||56||

A° āmalais tarubhedaiḥ kandalaiś ca latāviśeṣaiḥ satī śobhanā śrīr yāsām | amalaiś ca kandair bisair anyair vā mūlair lasantī śrīr yāsām | girimallikā kuṭajam | tacchabalitatvād bhramarair valitā veṣṭitāḥ || 57 ||

lg.l: vyadhita roṣarajaḥprasarojjhitā na na vadhūr navadhūrgatamanmathāḥ||58 ||

div.p: A° navo dhūrgataś ca paradhārādhirūḍhaḥ kāmo yāsāṃ tathāvidhā vadhūrabhrapavanaś cakāraiva | kuṭajādayo vārṣikāḥ kusumaviśeṣāḥ || 58 ||

lg.l: smṛtibhuvo virahe navamālatīmukulam udgara eva vadhūr vyadhāt |

div.p: A° mālatīkusumam eva mudgaraḥ praharaṇaviśeṣaḥ | sa eva smṛtibhuvaḥ sakāśād āgatena apaścimena prahārāntarāpekṣiṇā prahāreṇa mūrchitā yoṣitaś cakāra | mālatīkusumam eva kāmasya mudgara iti tu na yuktam | mudgaraśabdasyātra sāpekṣatayā samāsāprasaṅgāt | madarase madajanake madhuny ādaraḥ saṃmramo yeṣāṃ tathāvidhāḥ sāravāś ca bhramarā yasmin || 59 ||

lg.l: kam iva nāma na bāhulatāntaraṃ priyatamāyatamānayadīpsitam || 60 ||

div.p: A° āyataṃ bhujalatāmadhyaṃ | priyatamā kamīpsitaṃ priyaṃ nānayat | sarvam eva nijā vadhūḥ pariṣasvaje | harir aśvaḥ | rado dantaḥ | kālikā meghapaṅktiḥ, aśvānāṃ vayovijñānacihnaṃ ca | māna eva tamaḥ | mālinyahetutvāt || 60 ||
iti varṣāḥ

lg.l: dayitayeva janaḥ śaradāśrito mudam alaṃ damalaṅghanam ācarat || 6 1 ||

div.p: A° śaradā hetunā mudam āśrito janaḥ sutarāṃ damasya śānter laṅghanam akarot | apaghanā megharahitā | apaghanāś cāṅgāni | hṛdayahāriśobho nava iṣa āśvayujo yasyām | hṛdayanandanaś ca śobhano veṣo yasyāḥ | veṣo veśa ākalpa ity arthāntaram || 61 ||

lg.l: drutagatipravaṇās turagā iva klamabhṛto divasā dhutakaṃdharāḥ |

div.p: A° kamalānāṃ komalaṃ kuḍmalaṃ janānāṃ haste yatra tadbhāvaṃ dadhatīṃ śriyaṃ śaraddivasā ūhire dadhuḥ | turagā iva | tair api kamalahastā śrīr uhyate | tatsaṃnidhau śriyaḥ sthānāt | kaṃ jalaṃ śiraś ca dhārayantīti kaṃdharā jalabhṛto grīvāś ca | ‘saṃjñāyāṃ bhṛtṝvṛjidhārisahitapidamaḥ’ iti khac ||62 ||

lg.l: patati vṛṣṭir asau mayi nādhunā dinakarātapasevanalālasam |
iti vikāsam agād iva cintayac ciram udāramudā yutam ambujam || 63 ||

div.p: A° udārayā mudā yuktam itīva cintayaj jalajamātapasevāsaspṛhaṃ vyakasat || 63 ||

lg.l: kvacid avāpyata citraśikhaṇḍibhir na rucirā rucirākaluṣīkṛtaiḥ || 64 ||

div.p: A° candrakai rājitāḥ śobhitās taiś citraiḥ śikhaṇḍibhir mayūrai rucirā rucir nālabhyata | citraśikhaṇḍinaś ca saptarṣayaḥ | taiś candrakarair ajitair api niśāpagame na dīpyate || 64 ||

lg.l: abhṛta candramasā samam uccakair avikalaṃ vikalaṅkatayā śriyam ||65||

div.p: A° īyivat gatam | samabhihāraḥ paunaḥpunyam | avikalaṃ samagram || 65 ||

A° tāpavighātasya viparyayo 'nyathātvam atrāparighātaḥ | tatsthityā vilakṣatā trapā | ayukchadāḥ saptacchadās teṣāṃ kānanaiḥ | ayukchadakānāṃ vā ānanair mukhai rasamahāsaṃ kṛtvā niyatam ambudā ahāsiṣata | vayam adhunā tāpopaghātapaṭavaḥ, na yūyam itīva vikasvaratvena hasitā ity arthaḥ | hāso vikāso hasanaṃ ca | ahāsiṣatety upadhāvṛddhir ātmanepadaviṣayatvāc ciṇvadbhāvaprasaṅgāc ca | tasmāt kānanakartṛko 'samo hāso yatra tathā kṛtvā aha kaṣṭaṃ āsiṣateti yojyam || 66 ||
A° candrāṃśavo bhramarāṇāṃ kumudeṣu dalayantraṇaṃ pattrabandham adalayan bibhiduḥ | davathuḥ saṃtāpaḥ || 67 ||

lg.l: sthagayituṃ pratikūlavilokanāḥ kusumitāḥ kakubho nu viyoginām |

div.p: A° adhikastavanato ramyatayā bahalastutibhājo vanataḥ kānanāj jalād vā kamalarajo vātānāṃ samūhaḥ | kusumitatvād viruddhadarśanā diśaḥ pidhātum iva | kusumitā rajasvalā api | nuśabda ivārthe || 68 ||
A° ghanānāṃ jālasya tiraskṛtir antardhānaṃ yatra tasyāṃ śaradi nadītaṭair jaghanajā kāntir atanyata | śakunayaḥ khagāḥ || 69 ||

lg.l: na navam āttavatāṃ madhupāyinām alasatā lasatām abhavat kvacit || 70 || '

div.p: A° ucchvasan madhu makarandaṃ yatra, karīraiś ca tarubhedaiś citā vyāptā sthitir yasya tādṛśaṃ vanaṃ gṛhītavatāṃ bhramarāṇām alasatā kvacin nāsīt | kasumam apy ucchvasad vikasvaraṃ madhukarībhyaś ca racitasthiti kṛtāvasthānam | ṛtuḥ prāpto 'sya ārtavam | ‘ṛtor aṇa’ ity aṇa | lasatāṃ krīḍatām || 70 ||

lg.l: na khalu bāṇagaṇena śarāsanaśriyam ṛtor dadhatā vitathākhyatā |

div.p: A° vitathā niṣphalā ākhyā pratītir yeṣāṃ tadbhāvo bāṇākhyakusumasamūhena śaratsaṃbandhinā dhṛtaḥ | viyogimanobhedanāt | bāṇāś ca śarāḥ sūkṣmaśaravyabhedakā vitathapratītayo na bhavanti | śarā asanāś ca tarubhedāḥ śarāsanaṃ ca dhanuḥ | alavaṃ prabhūtaṃ tāpaṃ karoti yas tena || 71 ||

A° rasaḥ pāradaṃ tatkriyā dhātuvādas tayeva śaracchriyā sthitir avāpi padaṃ nibaddham | āgamaḥ pravṛttiḥ śāstrasaṃpradāyaś ca | tārā nakṣatrāṇi tāraṃ ca rūpyam | kālikā kalaṅko vyājaś ca (?) tāmrādikṛtaḥ | candraḥ śaśī suvarṇaṃ ca | kamalāni padmāni, kamalā ca lakṣmīḥ || 72 ||
A° kaṇiśaṃ sasyamañjarī | kalamaḥ śālibhedaḥ | kalo manoharo mandraś ca yo ravas tenākulaṃ kṛtvā || 73 ||
A° navaṃ saro viloḍayituṃ haṃsānāṃ gaṇasyāvasaraḥ prasaṅgaś cirād abhūt | kuṭumbinyaḥ priyā haṃsyaḥ || 74 ||

lg.l: abhṛta niṣkuṭajāṃ śriyam uccakaiḥ sa samayo 'samayogaśaśiprabhaḥ ||75 ||

div.p: A° niṣkuṭajāḥ kuṭajarahitāḥ | kuṭajānāṃ vārṣikatvāt | niṣkuṭā gṛhārāmāstebhyaś ca jātāḥ | asamo 'nanyasadṛśaḥ | śaśiprabhā yoṣito 'pi | śaśinaḥ prabhā yāsām iti kṛtvā || 75 ||

lg.l: stanam iva stabakaṃ vratatiḥ sravan nijarasaṃ jarasaṃ vyatipetuṣī || 76 ||

div.p: A° apāyayat pāyayāmāsa | kvacit ‘adhāpayat’ iti pāṭhaḥ | tatra ‘pādiṣu dheṭa upasaṃkhyānam’ iti ‘nigaraṇa-’ iti prāptasya parasmaipadasya niṣedhāt kartrābhiprāye kriyāphale ‘ṇicaś ca’ iti taṅ | raso madhu stanyaṃ ca | jarasaṃ vyatipatuṣī jarām atikrāntā | ‘jarāyā jarasanyatarasyām’ iti jaras || 76 ||

lg.l: sarasakesaratāmarasaṃ saraḥ sarasatām alināṃ rasatāṃ vyadhāt || 77 ||

div.p: A° sarabhasenātmanā hetunā puraḥsarāsu sārasīṣu anurāgabhareṇa pūritā ye sārasā lakṣmaṇās tair mukharitaṃ saro bhramarāṇāṃ kvaṇatāṃ sarasatvam akarot | raso rāgaḥ || 77 ||

lg.l: mṛgagaṇasya manaḥ śrutam ākṣipat pracurasasyarasasya jighatsataḥ || 78 ||

div.p: A° tālāḥ karayoḥ parasparam abhighātāḥ | teṣāṃ layaḥ śobhā śleṣo vā | gītam eva gītakaṃ gānam | gītakaṃ madrakādiviśiṣṭaṃ gītaṃ prakaṭatālalayaṃ bhavati | tatra tālāś cañcapuṭacācapuṭādayaḥ | teṣāṃ layo drutamadhyavilambitabhedena tridhā kālāntarānuvṛttiḥ | uktaṃ ca-‘tālah kālāntarasthāyī drutamadhyavilambitaḥ | tridhā laya iti prokto badarāmalabilvavat ||’ iti | pracure sasye raso yasya | jighatsatas tad evāttum icchataḥ || 78 ||
A° samadaḥ pratigajo 'treti bhrāntyā kṣubhitatā kṣobhas tayā vyāptān anilaḥ kuñjarān akarot || 79 ||
[iti śarat ]
A° himaṛtāv ity atra ‘ṛty akaḥ’ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ | karṇikā bījakoṣaḥ karṇābharaṇaṃ ca | karṇau ca śrotre | vimalitā mṛditā dhavalitā ca | ata evālināṃ tāpakṛt || 80||
A° śītabādhabhayenārtayeva latayā sāliṅganaḥ kṛtas taruḥ śuśubhe | caturayā prauḍhayā || 81 ||

lg.l: abhimukhaṃ valati sma dhutasphuratkaratalā ratalālasayā vadhūḥ || 82 ||

div.p: A° rate lālasā rucir yasyāḥ || 82 ||
[iti hemantaḥ ]

lg.l: samaya eva guṇo 'py upayujyate saparirambharuciṃ dayitaṃ striyāḥ | |

div.p: A° nāsti karāṇām uṣṇimā saṃtāpo yasya tādṛśo gopatir aṃśumān yatra || 83 ||

lg.l: churayati sma mukhāny abhito diśām anavaro navarodhramahīruhaḥ || 84 ||

div.p: A° ghanasāraṃ karpūram | mu| khāni vadanāny api | anavaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ || 84 ||

lg.l: tyajati kaḥ prakṛtopakṛtiṃ janaḥ sapadi nāpadi nāma malīmasaḥ ||5||

div.p: A° haimaṃ tuhinasaṃbandhi | kamalākaraḥ śrīprado 'pi | āpadi malinaḥ ko nāma prakarṣeṇa kṛtopakāram api na muñcati | ‘praṇayaprakṛti’ iti pāṭhe snehakāraṇam ity arthaḥ || 85 ||

lg.l: apaciteṣu pareṣu viṣaṇṇatām upagataṃ kusumeṣv aham utthitam |

div.p: A° kvaṇatāṃ bhramarāṇāṃ paṅktyābhivyāptatvād ittham iva kundaṃ tapasi māghe 'bhyadhāt | hasad vikasat || 86 ||
A° himartor udayāt aśanair amandaṃ aṅganā udakaṇṭhiṣata sotkaṇṭhā jātāḥ | lavaṅgaṃ puṣpabhedaḥ | araśanaiḥ śītavaśān mekhalāśūnyaiḥ || 87 ||
A° phalinī priyaṃgulatā | sādhuḥ śreṣṭhaḥ | madhuvratā bhramarāḥ || 88 ||

lg.l: alir amaṃsta mahattapasaḥ phalaṃ navalavaṅgalavaṃ gahane gireḥ || 89||

div.p: A° girigahane bhramaro lavaṅgasya lavam āśritas tapaso māghasya phalaṃ tam evājñāsīt | girigahanasthaś ca munis tapaso vratasya phalaṃ dvandvasahiṣṇutādi samanubhavati | prasavo janmāpi | saurabhaṃ yaśo 'pi || 89 ||

lg.l: kṣaṇadayā sudṛśāṃ suratotsavakṣamatayā matayā ratir ādadhe || 90 ||

div.p: A° kṣaṇadā rātriḥ | tasyāḥ suratotsave kṣamatvaṃ dīrghataratvāt || 90 ||

lg.l: smṛtibhuvā hṛdi śalya ivārpite dadhati dārḍhyamatīva ca khādire |

div.p: A° rajany eva rākṣasī tayā ca kā yoṣito nāvacakhādire | sarvā eva grastāḥ | khādiraṃ śalyaṃ khadiradārumayaḥ kīlakaḥ || 91 ||

lg.l: śriyam adhān madhunā kṛtaṣaṭpadīr asamahā saratā lavalīlatā || 92 ||

div.p: A° nāsti lavaś chedo yasyās tādṛśī līlā yasya tadbhāvo yoṣitām āsīt | asamahāsam asādhāraṇahasitaṃ rataṃ nidhuvanaṃ yasyāṃ sā | madhunā puṣparasena | saratā pravahatā | kṛtaḥ ṣaṭpadīnāṃ rasamaho rāgotsavo yayā sā lavalīnāma latā ca śuśubhe || 92 ||

lg.l: kopaḥ ka eva dayite tam ihānayestva-

div.p: A° ‘dayitaṃ prati na kopo yuktaḥ, tam ānaya tvam’ ity āśayena yoṣid anavame śreṣṭhe mandarasya sānuni āliṃ gatā sakhī jagāma | navam apūrvaṃ amandarasā bahalānurāgā anunītiḥ prārthanā yatra tathā kṛtvā ca tena āliṅgatā saṃpariṣv ajamānena sā prasāditā ||93 ||

lg.l: lakṣmīṃ vahantam ṛtubhir nagam ity udaṃśu-

div.p: A° sthalīṣu vikasitā amalāḥ kesarāgā bakulataravo yasya taṃ giriṃ draṣṭuṃ sarāgamalake gaurī spṛśann īśvaro viniryayau | lulite kuṭilīkṛte || 94 ||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānaka- śrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye ṛtuvarṇano nāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ|
iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyote tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ ||
(yugmam)

lg.l: iva yūyam eva nanu pātum īśvarāḥ || 7 ||

div.p: (cakkalakam) |

lg.l: kim ivāsti yan na viditaṃ taveśituḥ || 13 ||
tad apīśa pṛcchasi yad adya tena naḥ |
kvacid eva kiṃcid api kartum akṣamaḥ |
adhigamya yaṃ punar udeti no janaḥ

div.p: yugmam
yugalakam

lg.l: paramaṃ tad eva tava tattvam adbhutam || 39 ||
sakalaṃ śṛṇoṣi na ca vetsi vetsi ca || 42 ||

div.p: yugalakam
yugalakam
tilakam

lg.l: na bahir na cāntar avabhāsase kvacit |
sakalaṃ jagat sṛjasi pāsi hansi ca |

div.p: yugmam

lg.l: sthita eka eva bhagavann aho bhavān
tava tābhir eva jagad etad icchayā
na sa māyayā tava tayā viḍambyate
na yathaiti tāmram iha tāmratāṃ punaḥ |
tava nātha na rcchati tathā svavāsanām || 137 ||
prakṛtiḥ pumān praṇava ity amī trayaḥ
gatir asti yatra na nabhasvataḥ kvacit || 145 ||

div.p: yugmam

lg.l: pṛthag asti vṛttir iha nāpi vṛttimān |
na tad asti yat kila vinākṛtaṃ tvayā || 156 ||
śivatāṃ sureśa kila tadvad ety aṇuḥ || 161 ||
bhagavan bhavān iva bhavaty aṇuḥ sphuṭam || 170 ||

div.p: pañcabhiḥ kulakam

lg.l: śirasi sthitaḥ śriyam asau tanoti te
bhagavann anādir aja ity api sphuṭaṃ
sa viparyayaś ca tava kena hetunā || 186 ||

div.p: yugmam

lg.l: tat prāptakālam iha yat kuru tat tvam anvag
ekaḥ plavas tvam anaghaḥ kim utārtiduḥkham || 196 ||

div.p: iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye bhagavatstutivarṇano nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ |
saptacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: kiṃ citram atra dalitaṃ ripu cakravāla -
m etat tvayā janani yat prasabhaṃ raṇāgre |
m āścarya dhāma nahi dīpa śikhā kadācit || 2 ||
cakrā na jātu raṇalālasayā punas tvam || 5 ||
udgītham om iti yad akṣaram āmananti
āsede 'nyair dainyam aprāptadaityaiḥ(?) śaureḥ śūrair antikaṃ ratnasānau||170||
